definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Yang state board of trade each big trading company surrender a book.
sentences.chinese: 扬州商会各大商行的投诚书。

sentences.english: The administrative departments of industry and commerce at all levels shall be responsible for the administration of famous trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 各级工商行政管理部门负责著名商标的管理工作。

sentences.english: The big company merged various small businesses.
sentences.chinese: 那家大公司兼并了多家小商行。

sentences.english: This foreign firm has little means .
sentences.chinese: 这家外国商行没有多大资力。

sentences.english: The number of enterprises at yearend refer to the enterprises registered at Industry and Commerce Administrative Department.
sentences.chinese: 年末实有企业指在工商行政管理部门登记注册的企业。

sentences.english: At the same time, it shall report to the administrative department at the provincial level where it is located.
sentences.chinese: 同时，抄报其所在地省级工商行政管理部门。

sentences.english: hey mainly trade with Japanese firms.
sentences.chinese: 他们主要和日本商行进行贸易。

sentences.english: We can merge our two small businesses into a larger one.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以把我们的两家小商店合并为一家大商行。

sentences.english: Mass production has brought many old trades to an end.
sentences.chinese: 许多老字号商行都败给了大规模生产。

sentences.english: His team does freelance work for banks and businesses in need of airtight security.
sentences.chinese: 他的团队为需要无懈可击安全的银行和商行义务劳动。

sentences.english: They mainly trade with Japanese firms.
sentences.chinese: 他们主要和日本商行进行贸易。

sentences.english: Big business enjoys certain priviledges that small ones do not.
sentences.chinese: 大商行享有小商店所没有的优惠权。

sentences.english: Mine is a confirming abode in Lagos.
sentences.chinese: 本自己搞是拉各斯的一家保付商行。

sentences.english: Yu Yuncai was appointed Deputy Director-General of the Industry and Commerce Administration of Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 任命于云彩为湖南省工商行政管理局副局长。

sentences.english: The firm has more clients than it can take care of.
sentences.chinese: 这家商行的主顾多得应接不暇。

sentences.english: The wider victims of Chinese con artists targeting foreigners are Chinese businesses.
sentences.chinese: 中国骗子诈骗外国人，更多的受害者却是中国商行。

definition: money farm (dealing in illegal foreign currency of money laundering)
to specialize in (a particular product or service)/monopoly
